issue.title: [CF 1642] Custom sound file function is broken.
issue.body:
This is the string that i put in tmw's file path  - CustomSounds/test.mp3

This is the actual file path : D:\World of Warcraft\CustomSounds\test.mp3

 

Have already restarted the game, tried other files, none works.


> Posted by CurseForge user shinjiat | Imported from CurseForge issue #1642 | Raw
